short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: InfoApp organizes and tracks your Sales and Marketing folks with your most exciting content to present the value of your offering.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: InfoApp is a lightweight, cloud-enabled solution that centralizes content into a format that can be used by individuals and small to enterprise businesses.  This format can be used for Sales to send specific content to a customer, a Social Media page to channel traffic to your social channels and a Kiosk for customers to select and receive content.   All of this can be set-up within minutes as it is SaaS based solution.
